DOC.brief_summary: The investigators developed [68Ga]-labelling Anti-EGFR Affibody Molecule as a targeted molecular imaging agent for noninvasive and repeatable detecting EGFR-ECD expression status.
DOC.brief_title: In Vivo EGFR-ECD Molecular Imaging Using [68Ga]- Labelling Anti-EGFR Affibody Molecule
DOC.detailed_description: The goals of investigators are to evaluate the use of [68Ga]-labelling Anti-EGFR Affibody Molecule as a novel PET/CT radiotracer to monitor EGFR-ECD expression status and classify EGFR-ECD benefit NSCLC patients. The investigators want to evaluated the use of [68Ga]-labelling Anti-EGFR Affibody Molecule in lung cancer imaging in adult NSCLC patients with different EGFR-ECD expression status of primary and metastatic cancers.
DOC.criteria: Advanced NSCLC 18 years or older A life expectancy of at least 12 weeks Presence of a malignant lesion within the chest of at least 0.5 cm diameter as measured by computed tomography (CT) Written informed consent Claustrophobia Pregnancy Metal implants in the thorax
